data.name: caffsim
data.description: R package for simulation of caffeine concentration <doi:10.12793/tcp.2017.25.3.141>. https://asancpt.github.io/caffsim

evidence: README install command: "#install.packages("cowplot") # if you don't have it"
"`caffsim` R package: Simulation of Plasma Caffeine Concentrations by Using Population Pharmacokinetic Model" (R package intended to be used via library/import).

Usage examples show it being called from other R code: "library(caffsim)" and functions like `caffPkparam`, `caffConcTime`, `caffPlot`, indicating it is a reusable analysis/simulation tool that generates PK datasets and plots.
